byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Elian Peltier.

lead_paragraph: The crime problem, a constant here amid the tourists, has been escalating, according to the union that represents workers at the tower. The site was closed for most of Friday because of the walkout.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; France: Complaints About Pickpockets Prompt a Strike at the Eiffel Tower
headline.main: Eiffel Tower Workers Stage a Strike to Protest Pickpockets

snippet: The crime problem, a constant here amid the tourists, has been escalating, according to the union that represents workers at the tower. The site was closed for most of Friday because of the walkout.
abstract: Eiffel Tower workers close monument to protest lack of security for visitors and staff in response to problem of pickpockets, which has been growing.
